info.title: University Admissions System API
info.description: RESTful API for managing university admissions, student enrollment, and academic records

get.summary: Get a list of admission applications
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of admission applications. Admin and staff can see all applications, students can only see their own.

200.description: List of admission applications retrieved successfully

post.description: Create a new admission application. Students can only create applications for themselves unless they have admin/staff permissions.

term_id.description: ID of the term for which the student is applying

comments.example: Looking forward to joining the program

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific admission application. Students can only view their own applications.

put.description: Update an admission application. Students can only update their own draft applications. Admin/staff can update any application.

delete.description: Delete an admission application. Students can only delete their own draft applications. Admin can delete any application.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all courses with their departments and prerequisites

post.description: Store a newly created course with optional prerequisites

department_id.description: ID of the department this course belongs to

get.description: Display the specified course with its department and prerequisites

department_id.description: ID of the department this course belongs to

delete.description: Remove the specified course from storage

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all departments with their faculties and programs

faculty_id.description: ID of the faculty this department belongs to

get.description: Display the specified department with its faculty and programs

faculty_id.description: ID of the faculty this department belongs to

delete.description: Remove the specified department from storage

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all faculties with their departments
Display the specified faculty with its departments

delete.description: Remove the specified faculty from storage

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all system permissions. Only accessible by admin and staff users.

parameters.name: include_roles
parameters.description: Include roles associated with each permission

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific permission by ID. Only accessible by admin and staff users.

parameters.name: include_roles
parameters.description: Include roles associated with this permission

get.summary: Get program choices for an admission application
get.description: Retrieve all program choices for a specific admission application. Students can only see choices for their own applications.

200.description: List of program choices retrieved successfully

post.description: Add a new program choice to an admission application. Students can only add choices to their own applications.

program_id.description: ID of the program to choose

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific program choice. Students can only view choices for their own applications.

put.description: Update a program choice. Students can only update choices for their own draft applications. Admin/staff can update any choice.

delete.description: Delete a program choice. Students can only delete choices from their own draft applications. Admin can delete any choice.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all system roles. Only accessible by admin and staff users.

parameters.name: include_permissions
parameters.description: Include permissions associated with each role

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific role by ID. Only accessible by admin and staff users.

parameters.name: include_permissions
parameters.description: Include permissions associated with this role

id.description: Unique identifier of the admission application

student_id.description: ID of the student who submitted the application

term_id.description: ID of the term for which the application is submitted

application_date.description: Date and time when the application was created

decision_date.description: Date and time when the decision was made

comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the application
comments.example: Looking forward to joining the program

program_choices.description: List of program choices for this application (when loaded)

updated_at.description: When the permission was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier of the program choice

application_id.description: ID of the admission application this choice belongs to

program_id.description: ID of the program being chosen

preference_order.description: The preference order of this program choice (1 = most preferred)

status.description: Current status of this program choice

updated_at.description: When the role was last updated
